alert.note: Alert for Kiowa (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 27 at 6:34PM MDT until May 27 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL KIOWA COUNTY... At 634 PM MDT, a confirmed tornado was located over Sweetwater Reservoir, or 19 miles northwest of Lamar, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornado will be near... Sweetwater Reservoir around 645 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this tornadic thunderstorm include Neeoshe Reservoir. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
